title: 300k $SWM for Day-to-Day Business Operations
body:
In order to run Swarm flexibly and quickly, it is proposed to allocate $300k of SWM from the Treasury and use it under Swarm Council oversight.

Title: Day-to-Day Business Operations
Sponsor: Daniel Reis Faria
Created: 11-05-2021
Version: version no.1
Ballot Type: Approval Ballot
Voting Period: 7 days
Staking Address: Exempt from the staking requirements per SNC-2019.02/Article VII.B.10

## Purpose and rationale for the Governance Action and its intended outcomes
In order to be able to pay for day-to-day expenses incurred by Swarm, such as marketing, in a flexible and unbureaucratic manner, a sum of $300kSWM is estimated.

## Identify the specific uses for which Swarm Treasury funds may be expended to support the Governance Action;
Allocate $300k $SWM from the  treasury to a wallet that is under the supervision of the swarm council
author: 0x102D67E6d2BcdC5f66C079d4a383d3cefA5023b0
